feed.title: Evan Dogariu
feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: List of papers/textbooks
entry.content: The list is here. It touches many fields and contains more stuff than I may learn in my entire academic career, but I find that it is helpful for me to read casually, learn in my free time, and stay organized.
entry.summary: A list of papers/textbooks that I am reading or wanting to read.
